data.meta_description: These are the credits to Project Zero 2: Wii Edition. Keisuke Kikuchi Makoto Shibata Masayuki Terao Toru Hirano Yutaka Koga Makoto Shibata Tsuyoshi Iuchi Yosuke Usui Gaku Arai Wataru Iwasaki Hirofumi Fujimoto Hiroyuki Aoyagi Koji Mishima Tomo Matayoshi Takanori Murakami Shingo Suzuki Hisanori...
